property.name: offer_key
property.value: War3zuk And his Gang of Cut Throat Thirsty Bastards have run off with my Porn Stash. Track them down. Kill them all And bring back my Shit.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: War3zuk Has done it again. hes stole all the Backup Grub. Go get my Stuff And if you see his Crew Fuck Them Up.

property.value: War3zuk has knicked off with My Stoggy Stash. The finest Cigars on this heavenly Earth. Get them back at ANY cost.
